channel.title: Potions
channel.description: hey, i am currently adding herby to my 317 server but a few of the pots dont work, anyone know how to make it so a potion gives u temporary lvls such as fishing?

item.title: Potions
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

try using this one:

break; case 2438: // fish (4) if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000) return; c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.strPot = true; c.strPotTimer = 20; c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[10]); c.cba = c.abc / 10; c.abc2 = c.cba * 2; if (c.abc2 <= 1) { c.abc2 = 2; } c.setAnimation(829); c.playerLevel[2] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[10]); c.playerLevel[2] += c.abc2; c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[10]+"", 4006); c.deleteItem(2438, slot, 1); c.addItem(151, 1); c.updateRequired = true; c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[10] + "", 4006); c.strPotTimer = 60; c.sM("You drink some of your fishing potion."); c.sM("You have 3 doses of potion left.");

Read full topic

item.title: Potions
item.dc:creator: @Darkmagic42 Darkmagic42
item.description:
@Darkmagic42 wrote:

i cant get it to work, im now able to drink it but it doesnt add levels to anything, this is the code i added, u see anything wrong?

break;case 151: // fishing pot (3)
if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000)
return;
c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
c.strPot = true;
c.strPotTimer = 20;
c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[10]);
c.cba = c.abc / 10;
c.abc2 = c.cba * 2;
if (c.abc2 <= 1) {
c.abc2 = 2;
}
c.setAnimation(829);
c.playerLevel[2] = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]);
c.playerLevel[2] += c.abc2;
c.sendFrame126(""+c.playerLevel[10]+"", 4006);
c.deleteItem(151, slot, 1);
c.addItem(153, 1);
c.updateRequired = true;
c.appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[10] + “”, 4006);
c.strPotTimer = 60;
c.sM(“You drink some of your fishing potion.”);
c.sM(“You have finished your potion.”);

item.title: Potions
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

this is super str pot.

break; case 2440: // super str (4) if (System.currentTimeMillis() -c.potionDelay < 2000) return; c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.potionDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); c.strPot = true; c.strPotTimer = 20; c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]); c.cba = c.abc / 10; c.abc2 = c.cba * 2; if (c.abc2 <= 1) { c.abc2 = 2; }

so for your fishing:
just change the

c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]);

to fishing

c.abc = c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[10]);

Just edit the

(c.playerXP[10])

SKILL’s ID’s:

public int playerAttack = 0; public int playerDefence = 1; public int playerStrength = 2; public int playerHitpoints = 3; public int playerRanged = 4; public int playerPrayer = 5; public int playerMagic = 6; public int playerCooking = 7; public int playerWoodcutting = 8; public int playerFletching = 9; public int playerFishing = 10; public int playerFiremaking = 11; public int playerCrafting = 12; public int playerSmithing = 13; public int playerMining = 14; public int playerHerblore = 15; public int playerAgility = 16; public int playerThieving = 17; public int playerSlayer = 18; public int playerFarming = 19; public int playerRunecrafting = 20;

ofcourse change the case to your selected potion id , and rename it.

case 2440: // super str (4)

like this

case XXX: // fishing (4) XXX - your item's id.

Give me a heads up of how did it go k ?

Read full topic
